user_query: I'm a cryptocurrency enthusiast and want to explore the markets of different cryptocurrencies. Can you fetch the latest details and market UUIDs for all active assets? Additionally, provide me with the coins listed on the exchange with the UUID -zdvbieRdZ and their corresponding market details.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest details and market UUIDs for all active cryptocurrencies.
Retrieve the coins listed on the exchange with the UUID -zdvbieRdZ.
Fetch the market details for the coins retrieved from the exchange with UUID -zdvbieRdZ.
